version_description:
1、Fix some Bug；
2、Optimize ipod 5 display problem；

1、Fix some Bug；
2、Optimization Display；

Content:
1、the level CAP to reach level 70
2、Base increased prosperity system, raise the level of prosperity can improve Soldiers number
3、Big World：Rich ore and Search Nearby
4、 every day transport escort ships , can win a big award；
You can get Free Energy and Activeness Rewards daily！
View more exciting content，please update the game ASAP

Version Changes
1、Add a new building [Warship Laboratory],in the building,upgrade ships, can enhance the base value of warships
2、Add Military Exercise Score Store, you can get exercise score from the exercise rankings reward, each combat exercises also can get the score
3、Tech Center adding Resist-Combo, Warehouse's Capacity, Warship's Load and other technology
4、Copy of the alliance: The last reward of each chapter changed to alliance copy chest
More exciting content，please update ASAP

Version Changes
1,Adding Cross-Servers Challenge, participate in the Millitary Brain.
You will encounter the captains from other servers in Cross-Servers Challenge. Beat them to get a higher Tiers and abundant Rewards.
2, You can now appoint the General as the Supreme commander or Chief of Staff in Base. This will make your fleet more powerful, avoiding generals being idle.
3, You can use Resources to exchange for Energy Core to increase warship attributions in the Warships Laboratory
4, Four new SS Generals available, which can be Enhanced to +9.

Content:
Fix some bug;

Content:
Fix some bug

Version Changes:
Newly add Cross-Server Alliance War
Only top 8 alliances in several different servers can participate.
Fight for the champion! Fight for the alliance's honor! Fight for the abundant rewards!
Which alliance is the King in all servers?

1. Bandits Strike unlocked. All server players lay siege to Bandits in Big World. Weekly Personal Ranking and Alliance Ranking grant handsome rewards.
2. Military Affairs unlocked. 3 times for daily challenge.
3. Bug fixing and improvements.

1.Added Fittings system.
Warships with fittings equipped have more powerful Puncture and Defense,helping your fleet becomes more unstoppable.
2. Fixed some bugs and improved some functions.

1, Add General Advance system,Selectively enhance the general's power;
2. Add Base Style system,Create an exclusive base;
3, Add new set of equipment, Enrich the quality of equipment.

Updates:
Fixed some bugs and improved some functions.

1. Added Endless War. Make a strategic combat plan in the endless exploration to fight for your honor.
2. Added high quality Fittings and Medals items.
3. Added quick use.
4.Bug fixing and improvements.

1. Added Museum: Collect artifacts for the museum to earn battle bonuses.
2. Added Relic Exploration: Players can explore relics on the World Map to discover Artifacts and Shards.
3. Bug fixing and improvements.

1.Add new Ship evolution function.
2. Add new Military rank.
3. Add new technology.
4.Bug fixing and improvements.

1、Added: Fittings Package attribute
2、Added:Xmas Fittings,Xmas general,Xmas equipment
3、Fix other bugs

4.Optimized the avatar system
